unnormalised: Okay, so return policies, right? Just last week, I bought a kurta from Fabindia for Diwali, but it didn't fit Ramesh! Had to return it. Their policy was clear, thank God. Some online stores are a pain, like trying to get a refund after eating spicy Hyderabadi biryani! Do returns within 7 days even apply during the Onam rush? Always check the fine print, folks!
